trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method when the value is not available.
trans-unit.target: 就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>時的值不是可用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "A system error has occurred."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體，系統提供的訊息，描述錯誤，例如 「 已發生系統錯誤 」。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref>類別具有指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter should be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 內容`message`參數應該是讓使用者能夠讀懂。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to make sure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Data.ValueUnavailableException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如前一個例外狀況直接結果可以包含在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，則為 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.SystemException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.SystemException>.</xref:System.SystemException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)，目前的例外狀況會在引發<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
